scripts.start-flask: cd flask-server && touch agent.py && source venv/bin/activate && pip3 install flask_cors && pip3 install pytz && pip3 install langchain && pip3 install langchain_openai && pip3 install python.dotenv && python agent.py
scripts.build-and-start: concurrently  "npm run build-frontend" "npm run start-server" "npm run start-flask"
